name: aws-sdk-js-v3-s3-larger-response-streaming-repro
description: Repro for larger-response-streaming probelm in AWS-SDK v3

scripts.prepare-bucket: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=__fake__ AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=__fake__ aws --endpoint http://127.0.0.1:4566/ s3 rb s3://head-object-test-bucket --force
scripts.start: npm run prepare-bucket; npm run execute-script
